Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the audit was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The operation associated with audit record.
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: The ID for correlated pipeline run events. Can be used to identify audits that belong to the same pipeline run.
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: The result of the entitlement evaluation. Options are: Granted = access granted; Denied = access was not granted; Revoked = accessed was revoked because the pipeline could not be fully approved; Actualized = the resource was accessed by the pipeline run.
Columns.Name: EntitlementResult

Columns.Description: The azure resource ID of the accessed resource.
Columns.Name: TargetResourceId

Columns.Description: The resource type of the accessed resource.
Columns.Name: TargetResourceType

Columns.Description: The participant friendly name as used in the contract negotiation.
Columns.Name: ParticipantName

Columns.Description: The participant tenant id. Enable query by the granted tenant invariant id. Example of retrieving this is for contoso: https://login.microsoftonline.com/contoso.com/.well-known/openid-configuration
Columns.Name: ParticipantTenantId

Columns.Description: Name of the user that initiated the pipeline. Available only if the audit relate to owned resource
Columns.Name: UserName

Columns.Description: The method used to grant access to the resource (Owned, Reference, Entitlement).
Columns.Name: GrantType

Columns.Description: The azure resource ID of the resource the grant is based on.
Columns.Name: GrantSource

Columns.Description: The type of the the resource the grant is based on.
Columns.Name: GrantSourceType

Columns.Description: The ID for the grant events. Can be used to correlate between different results of the same grant.
Columns.Name: GrantCorrelationId

Columns.Description: Textual summary of the granted access.
Columns.Name: EntitlementSummary

Columns.Description: The storage resource that the accessed CI resource points to, if applicable
Columns.Name: ReferencedResourceId

Columns.Description: The storage resource type that the accessed CI resource points to, if applicable.
Columns.Name: ReferencedResourceType

Columns.Description: The Location (Region) the resource was accessed in.
Columns.Name: Location

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
